data.comment: The big names in today's match at Earthquakes Stadium have now been confirmed.
The match has started.
In the minute 1, In San Jose a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Paul Marie (San Jose) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for San Jose in the half of Colorado.
In the minute 3, Can Colorado get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Jose's half?
Colorado have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
Kevin Stott awards San Jose a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Free kick Colorado.
Kevin Stott signals a free kick to San Jose in their own half.
San Jose have a goal kick.
In the minute 9, It's a goal kick for the away team in San Jose.
Kellyn Acosta gets his shot on target but fails to score for Colorado.
San Jose awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 12, Goal kick for Colorado at Earthquakes Stadium.
Corner awarded to Colorado.
Free kick for San Jose in their own half.
In the minute 16, Kevin Stott signals a San Jose throw-in in Colorado's half.
Throw-in for Colorado at Earthquakes Stadium.
Colorado to take a throw-in in San Jose territory.
In the minute 19, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Colorado in their own half.
San Jose drive upfield and Chris Wondolowski gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Colorado defender.
In the minute 22, Corner awarded to San Jose.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
San Jose awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 24, San Jose are pushing forward but Danny Hoesen's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Colorado goal kick.
Colorado are whistled for offside.
In the minute 26, The match at Earthquakes Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Danny Hoesen, who is down injured.
San Jose's Danny Hoesen looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Colorado are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 30, Chris Wondolowski of San Jose gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Colorado at Earthquakes Stadium.
Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Colorado in their own half.
In the minute 34, Colorado have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
Free kick for San Jose in their own half.
In the minute 35, Throw-in high up the field for Colorado in San Jose.
Matias Jesus Almeyda (San Jose) is making a first change, with Andy Rios replacing the possibly injured Danny Hoesen.
Colorado's Andre Shinyashiki misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a San Jose goal kick.
In the minute 37, Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Colorado in their own half.
Colorado awarded a free kick in their own half.
Oswaldo Alanis (San Jose) has received a yellow card from Kevin Stott.
In the minute 39, Kevin Stott signals a free kick to San Jose in their own half.
Corner awarded to San Jose.
Colorado needs to be cautious. San Jose have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for San Jose in the half of Colorado.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for San Jose close to the penalty box.
San Jose's Cristian Espinoza gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 44, Colorado have a goal kick.
Kevin Stott signals a free kick to San Jose.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in San Jose.
San Jose to take a throw-in in Colorado territory.
Throw-in Colorado.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Colorado in their own half.
Free kick for Colorado in the half of San Jose.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Kellyn Acosta is booked for the away team.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Free kick San Jose.
Kevin Stott awards Colorado a goal kick.
Throw-in for Colorado in their own half.
In the minute 50, Florian Jungwirth for San Jose has been booked by Kevin Stott and receives a first yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the away team in San Jose.
In the minute 52, Kevin Stott signals a throw-in for Colorado, close to San Jose's area.
Kevin Stott awards San Jose a goal kick.
Kevin Stott awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 53, Can San Jose get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Colorado's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in San Jose.
Ball safe as San Jose is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 55, Colorado have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
In San Jose, Andre Shinyashiki (Colorado) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
San Jose's Cristian Espinoza has been booked in San Jose.
In the minute 57, Colorado have a goal kick.
Diego Rubio hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in San Jose for Colorado.
Can Colorado capitalize from this throw-in deep inside San Jose's half?
In the minute 59, San Jose have been awarded a penalty in San Jose...
Goal! Chris Wondolowski gives San Jose a 1-0 lead from the penalty spot.
San Jose awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 62, Kevin Stott signals a Colorado throw-in in San Jose's half.
Kevin Stott signals a San Jose throw-in in Colorado's half.
Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Colorado in their own half.
Colorado have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
In the minute 64, Jonathan Lewis is on a sub for Andre Shinyashiki for Colorado.
Colorado make their second substitution with Kei Kamara replacing Diego Rubio.
In the minute 65, In San Jose a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Colorado.
Free kick for Colorado in the half of San Jose.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Colorado in the half of San Jose.
Colorado have a dangerous throw-in.
Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Colorado.
In the minute 70, Ball goes out of play for a San Jose goal kick.
The home team have replaced Paul Marie with Tommy Thompson. This is the second substitution made today by Matias Jesus Almeyda.
Cade Cowell is replacing Cristian Espinoza for the home team.
In the minute 73, Goal kick for San Jose at Earthquakes Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
In the minute 75, Corner awarded to San Jose.
Colorado awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as San Jose is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 76, Throw-in Colorado.
Corner awarded to Colorado.
In San Jose San Jose attack through Andy Rios. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 78, Colorado have a goal kick.
San Jose are coming forward and Cade Cowell gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Colorado goal kick.
In the minute 80, Matias Jesus Almeyda is making the team's fourth substitution at Earthquakes Stadium with Vako Qazaishvili replacing Shea Salinas.
Colorado have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
Kei Kamara (Colorado) levels the match at 1-1 with a header.
In San Jose a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 83, Cole Bassett (Colorado) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
San Jose's Oswaldo Alanis misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 84, It's a goal kick for the away team in San Jose.
Can Colorado get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Jose's half?
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to San Jose.
Throw-in for San Jose in their own half.
The away team replace Cole Bassett with Jeremy Kelly.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Kevin Stott signals a free kick to San Jose.
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
San Jose's Andy Rios breaks free at Earthquakes Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Kevin Stott awards Colorado a goal kick.
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Lalas Abubakar (Colorado) has received a first yellow card.
